mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hf_order_logistics h1 LEFT JOIN hf_orders h2 ON h1.orders_id = h2.id LEFT JOIN hf_orders_detail h3 ON h1.order_detail_id = h3.id LEFT JOIN hf_user h4 ON h1.user_id = h4.id LEFT JOIN hf_goods h5 ON h1.googs_id = h5.id LEFT JOIN hf_resp h6 ON h1.resp_id = h6.id LEFT JOIN hf_user_address h7 ON h1.user_address_id =h7.id

SELECT h2.id, h3.create_time, h3.modify_time, h7.hf_province, h7.hf_city, h7.hf_conty, h7.is_fault_address, h7.hf_address_detail, h4.username, h3.purchase_quantity, h4.phone, h5.hf_name, h2.amount, h3.googs_id, h3.order_detail_status, h8.file_id, h9.hf_value, h4.nick_name FROM hf_order_logistics h1 LEFT JOIN hf_orders h2 ON h1.orders_id = h2.id LEFT JOIN hf_orders_detail h3 ON h1.order_detail_id = h3.id LEFT JOIN hf_user h4 ON h1.user_id = h4.id LEFT JOIN hf_goods h5 ON h1.googs_id = h5.id LEFT JOIN hf_user_address h7 ON h1.user_address_id = h7.id LEFT JOIN hf_goods_pictrue h8 ON h8.goods_id = h5.id LEFT JOIN hf_goods_spec h9 ON h9.goods_id = h5.id WHERE h1.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY h3.modify_time DESC

SELECT * FROM hf_orders_detail h1 LEFT JOIN hf_orders h2 ON h1.orders_id = h2.id LEFT JOIN hf_user h4 ON h2.user_id = h4.id LEFT JOIN hf_goods h5 ON h1.googs_id = h5.id LEFT JOIN hf_user_address h6 ON h4.id =h6.user_id WHERE h2.id=#{id}
